subdisciplines.name: Medical Anthropology
subdisciplines.description: The study of how health and illness are experienced, understood, and treated in different cultures and societies.

subdisciplines.name: Environmental Anthropology
subdisciplines.description: The study of human-environment interactions and how they shape cultural and social practices.

subdisciplines.name: Urban Anthropology
subdisciplines.description: The study of how people and communities interact in urban areas.
